column1: Health o Meter HDR743 Digital Bathroom Scale, 350 lb Capacity
column5: Get ready to reach your weight loss goals with help from the Health O Meter Scale. It features a 1" display that gives you clear and crisp numbers for a precise reading and also measures weight up to 300 lbs in 0.2 lbs increments. This split-mat bath scale also comes with a 9V battery. It is lightweight, has textured pads on the top and offers convenient step-on technology. No need to tap it first, the numbers light up in red and are easy to see. Digital scales are what dominate the market today because they are easy to use, extremely accurate and can have an incredibly low profile. If you're looking for the best digital scale to use in your home, then you're going to want this Health O Meter Scale.
column6: This is very accurate and matches what the scale at the doctor's office tells me. I use it once a week to keep track of weight loss/gain. I give it four stars because the instructions say that you can either tap or step on the scale for your weight; however when I tried tapping it, the scale just did not turn on.

The sleek design allows it to blend with all types of bathroom decor. This battery digital scale is accurate up to 400 lbs. It measures weight in .2 lb increments on a large 1.5" LCD display.
column6: Arrived in a timely manner. Looks great is very functional. I use it every day to keep up with my progress. I would recogmind this product to anyone who weights over 300 pounds.

column1: My Life My Shop Digital Scale and Body Analyzer
column5: Whether you're attempting to slim down, training for a competition, or simply committing to a healthy lifestyle, your weight alone doesn't tell the whole story. With the My Life My Shop Digital Scale and Body Analyzer, you can keep track of your personal goals and measure vital body composition statistics to get a complete and accurate picture of your overall health. The My Life My Shop Digital Scale and Body Analyzer measures your body fat percentage, muscle mass, bone density, and water weight through an undetectable electrical current transmitted through your body via the stainless steel pads on the body analyzer platform providing you with a Bio Impedance Analysis, or BIA. The My Life My Shop Digital Scale and Body Analyzer is easy to set up and use and the body analyzer can store information for up to 8 users. Oh, and your weight? It measures and stores that too, in pounds and kilograms (up to 397 pounds).
column6:
This is an acurate scale. Its really thin, lightweight and you can put anywhere wuth no problem.
It has space for 8 users. And you can only use it for weight if you dont want the other mesuares.

I have a 18 moth baby so my stock of bone mass has decrease and this showed me how.
It doesnt sound like other scales when you touch the buttons.
The manual explains you the results of fat body , water and bone mass very well.

It doesnt come with batteries. It needs 4 AAA.

column1: Zimtown 180kg/396lb Digital Bathroom Scale Toughened  ...
column5:
Features:
1. Slim waist pattern design bathroom scales
2. Multi-point sensornon-slip scale feet
3. 0.1kg division value
4. 6mm thick tempered glass platform
5. HD backlit LCD display
6. Limited maximum weighing weight
7. Auto power-on when sensing weight
8. Auto shut down after leaving scale for 10 seconds
9. Design of circular edges and corners
10. Step-on technology, switch-on over 3kg
11. Base made of environmental protection material
12. Auto-switch-off, auto-zero, low battery and overload indication, backlit LCD display

 

Specifications:
1. Colour: Black
2. Dimensions: (12.00 x 12.00 x 0.79)" / (30.48 x 30.48 x 2.00)cm (L x W x H)
3. Weighing Platform Dimensions: (12.00 x 12.00)" / (30.48 x 30.48)cm (L x W)
4. Weight: 45.3oz / 1284.2g (Not Includ Package)
5. Maximum Capacity: 180kg / 397lb
6. Division value: 0.01kg / 0.02lb
7. Unit: lb/kg/ st
8. Sensor: Fifth Generation High-precision Sensor
9. Material: Toughened glass
10. Smart Power on: Immediate Auto Power on as soon as You Step on the Scale
11. Smart Power off: Auto Power off in 10 Seconds as soon as You Step off the Scale
12. Stand-by Time: About One Year(Based on the Actual Usage Frequency)
13. Display Screen: LCD Backlight Display
14. Power Supply: 1.5V x AAA Battery (Included)
15. Tolerance Range: 0.3-0.5kg

How to use:
1. Put batteries in the battery compartment at the back of the scale.
2. Units Switch: Press the unit key at the back of scale to choose kg/lb/st.
3. Keep the scale on the flat surface.
4. Step on the glass platform, the scale will turn on automatically.
5. Stand still for some seconds until LCD display shows your body weight.
6. The scale will turn off automatically after 5 seconds.
 
Note:
1. Switch-on over 3kg, this is not for light objects. If you want to weigh something below 7lb, we suggest customers buy Kitchen Scale.
2. People are at their lightest in the morning before breakfast. As food enters the body, weight goes up and by the afternoon, weight begins to fall back down. Exercise will also bring weight down. Keep in mind that weight fluctuates up to 4-6lbs throughout the day.
3. LCD display shows "LO" means low battery, please change the batteries.
4. LCD display shows "OL" means overload.

 

Package Includes:
1 x Personal Scale
1 x User Manual
2 x 1.5V AAA Battery
column6: Great scale. Shipping was very speedy. Packaging was a little suspect - flimsy and a bit crunched upon arrival. However, the scale arrived fully intact with no issues. Works great. Very fast "response time". Word of caution: There are no treads on the surface so be very careful stepping on the shiny, glass surface with wet feet. Haven't done this myself, but can just imagine.

column1: Taylor 7413 Textured Stainless Steel Digital Scale
column5: For the ultimate in performance and precision, turn to the Taylor 7413 Glass Digital Backlit LCD Bathroom Scale. A durable 11.8 x 11.8 tempered glass platform featuring a brushed metal finish gives this scale a timeless look and feel. This digital glass bathroom scale features a generous 4.2 x 2.3 LCD readout with blue backlight, prominently displaying accurate measurements up to 400 lb/180 kg in 0.2 lb/0.1 kg increments. Featuring Step-on Instant Read technology, this scale will automatically register and display your weight as soon as you step on the platform. Inside the box, you will find the Taylor 7413 Glass Digital Backlit LCD Bathroom Scale with brushed metal finish, an instruction manual, and 2 branded AAA batteries. column6:
Pros:  Very accurate, within .2 lb compared to my Dr's scale.  Consistent readings (wait for the display to blink 3 times while it arrives at a measurement).  Self-calibrates (be sure to let it re-calibrate if moved).  Works well on a semi-hard linoleum floor with a wood substrate.  Teeters on its feet when moved to an uneven surface but seems to self-adjust the feet after stepping on it again and no longer teeters.  Easy to read display.  I like having the stainless skin over glass, adds a level of non-slip confidence compared to glass top models plus it's less prone to scattering bits if the glass underlayer were to break.

Cons:  My only con is the platform is fairly small.  I would have given it 5 stars if it were larger.

column1: Excelvan Touch 440 lbs Total Body Bath Scale â€“ Measu  ...
column5: Newly updated, the Excelvan Touch 440 lbs Total Body Scale now provides instant adult and infant weight measurements, and calculates body fat, hydration, muscle mass and bone measurements. Embedded with StepOn technology, it automatically powers on upon contact and features 4 touch sensitive buttons for easy operation. It also features 4 icons that automatically illuminate on the screen for body fat, hydration, muscle and bone measurements. The Ozeri Touch includes built-in memory for up to 8 user profiles with auto recognition technology for shared use at home, the office or the gym. Each profile stores weight, gender, height, and age data so that your family members can each track their progress. The Ozeri Touch Total Body Scale combines advanced algorithms with bioelectrical impedance analysis (BIA), incorporating a person's age, height, gender and weight, for its accurate measurements. BIA is a well-established and respected method used to estimate body fat and hydration. Muscles, blood vessels and bones are body tissues with a relative high water content which conducts electricity easily. Body fat is tissue that on the other hand displays much less electric conductivity. With BIA, the Ozeri Scale sends a weak and harmless electrical current through your body to determine the amount of fat tissue. This weak electrical current is imperceptible to the user, and returns back data that is used to instantly calculate the advanced measurements. The Ozeri Touch Total Body Scale displays all results on its easy to read high-contrast LCD screen with blue digits. It utilizes 4 latest generation GX sensors to capture weights up to 440 lbs (200 kg) with industry leading accuracy. With its innovative Tare feature, the Ozeri Touch Bath scale also eliminates all the stress with weighing an infant or pet. Simply step on the scale to record your weight, step off and back on again while carrying your infant or pet, and the scale accurately displays both weights on separate sections of its bright LCD. The Ozeri Touch Tare feature also works as a handy luggage scale so there are no unpleasant surprises at the airport, and it just as easily weighs parcels and boxes. It turns off automatically to conserve battery power, and runs on 2 included Lithium batteries for optimal performance. The scale is made of impact resistant tempered glass which is 4 times stronger than normal glass, and boasts a reflective surface and elegant design.
column6: The digital display is pretty cool. The display is all touch and surprisingly all run on two tiny batteries! Sometimes I get on it and it gives me an estimate but when I step on it two more times the measurement is probably my actual weight. I haven't compared it to the scale at the VA Hospital yet but it seems like it might be the same or close to it. The instruction manual is easy to understand and has a bunch of different languages so should be easy for most to follow. The whole thing is pretty cool and techie and worth the thirty something dollars I spent on it! It says white but it seems more of a light creamish greenish color and so far that's my only tit or tat about it! Time will tell how it holds up and I'm grateful that I can find the replacement batteries online.

column1: Ozeri Rev Digital Bathroom Scale with Electro-Mechan  ...

Boasting a visually arresting design, the Ozeri Rev scale features a huge 5.5 inch mechanical dial display with an integrated digital blue-backlit LCD, accented by stylish chrome to create a distinctive retro look, yet with the accuracy of modern technology. This professional quality scale features an oversized platform made of impact-resistant tempered glass with slip-resistant feet for ideal stability, and a new built-in alarm that reminds you to measure your weight at the same time each day. The Ozeri Rev Digital Bathroom Scale uses 4 high precision GX sensors that weigh up to 400 lbs (180 kg) in 0.2 lbs or 0.1 kg increments. Whether your goals are weight loss or muscle gain, the Ozeri Rev features the latest generation of StepOn technology to display your precise body weight upon stepping onto the scale, with no tapping required. The Ozeri Rev Digital Bathroom Scale is auto-calibrated and automatically turns off to conserve battery life. It runs on 3 AAA batteries (included) and features a Low Battery Indicator. Your Satisfaction is 100% Guaranteed.
column6:
I have owned many scales over the years and decided recently that it was time for a new one. This scale from Ozeri is really sleek looking. It has a retro look to it as well. There is a dial as well as a digital readout which I love.  

Usually I don't have my glasses on when I weigh myself and the scale flashes the weight when it's done getting a reading and holds it for 10 seconds which is long enough for me to get close enough to read it!

 The scale can be easily switched between pounds and kilograms and weighs up to 400 pounds in 0.2 pound or 0.1 kilogram increments. This scale even has an alarm you can set to remind you to weigh yourself at the same time everyday!  I've compared the weight displayed with this scale with others I own and it's very accurate. As well I can use it multiple,times and get the same reading. It works equally well on my hardwood or slate floors. Highly recommended.

I received this product at no cost. The opinions stated here are my own after using the product.

column1: Ozeri WeightMaster 400 lbs Digital Bath Scale with B  ...
column5: The Ozeri WeightMaster 400 lbs Digital Bath Scale with BMI and Weight Change Detection was designed and engineered in the USA to provide a comprehensive yet simple weight management solution to measure and track your weight. Featuring BMI Measurement and Auto Recognition Technology, the Ozeri WeightMaster weighs up to 400 lbs and displays your BMI (Body Mass Index), a measure of your body fat based on your height and weight. Immediately after displaying your weight and BMI, the scales Weight Change Detection displays your net weight change from your last weigh-in (L1), the average of your last 3 weigh-ins (L3), and last 7 weigh-ins (L7). By measuring your weight once a day, the Ozeri WeightMaster empowers you to see how your current weight changes day to day, from the last 3 days, and over the previous week. For users who would rather just focus on their weight trend without worrying so much about the actual numbers, the WeightMaster features Color Alert Technology, which displays your weight change in a GREEN illumination for weight loss and RED for weight gain, providing a visual form of intuitive feedback. With built-in intelligence, the WeightMaster requires no complicated synching and spares you the data connection failures common to more expensive wireless and Bluetooth alternatives. Precision engineered and durably made, WeightMaster auto-calibrates with StepOn technology and auto-powers off to preserve battery life. The Ozeri WeightMaster is made out of impact-resistant tempered glass, and equipped with non-slip scratch-resistant feet that wont damage flooring. Ships with 3 AAA batteries included, and backed by Ozeri's 100% Hassle-Free Satisfaction Guarantee.
column6: I love this scale for many reasons. You can track your weight and BMI and it stores it for up to 7 days. It also does multi-family if needed. My favorite thing about this scale is when you gain weight the display turns red, and when you lose weight it turns green. It's fun to step on and see that green light! Works amazing, it weighs me exactly the same as my doctors office each month. I like that it takes 3 AAA batteries and not the little rounds ones. I never replaced those in my last scales so this one is a keeper for me. It also has small legs to stay balanced properly and it's scratch resistant to your floors as well. Very durable and will last a long time! Very happy with this scale!!

column1: Taylor 5780F Stainless Steel Body Analysis Bathroom   ...
column5: For the ultimate in performance and precision body analysis, turn to the Taylor 5780F Stainless Steel Body Analysis Bathroom Scale. This body analysis scale offers a full suite of features for measuring and tracking your health objectives including body fat, body water and muscle mass estimators. The Taylor 5780F Stainless Steel Body Analysis Bathroom Scale provides BMI (body mass index) estimations based on height and age, as well as daily calorie intake estimates that give you an idea of how many calories you can consume in a day to maintain your current weight. This scale can recognize and store data for 10 users in Normal or Athlete modes. An oversized 12.2 x 12.2 black platform is complimented with brushed stainless steel accents. column6:
I'm an exercise science major going for a CSCS as well as being a professional natural bodybuilder. Whereas I'm moving away from my college where I'd normally do skin-folds as a way to get my body fat percentage, I decided to buy this scale to take the place of skin-folds although I'm aware that electronic readings tend to be off. With that said, I can confirm that this scale is WAY OFF.

When it comes to body weight itself, it's fair to say that it's within 1lb when it comes to accuracy. I stepped on it multiple times to make sure it was consistent. The problem, however, was every other reading. Specifically bodyfat and water weight percentages. Being 6 weeks out from my current show, my last skin-fold had me marked at 7% BF. This scale had me marked at 23.3% BF. This is a massive difference.

BMI was pretty spot on. At only 5'6 and around 172lbs, it was correct. I admire that they made a "Normal" and "Athlete" mode that is supposed to help you when it comes to daily calorie intake, but it's showing my suggested maintenance calories to be around 3100g which is untrue in all ways (It's over by about 1000g of calories).

All in all, I was really hoping this scale would AT LEAST be within 7% accuracy on the body fat percentage measurements, but the only thing on it that is accurate is the weight.

Sorry for the story, but I wanted to be as detailed as possible.

column1: Health O Meter Oversized Dial Scale (HAB401DQ-99)
column5: The Health O Meter Oversized Dial Scale provides a simple, reliable way to measure and monitor your weight. This analog bathroom scale accurately measures up to 330 pounds in 1-pound increments. The large 5.5-inch dial shows weight readings clearly, allowing you to easily see your weight at a glance. Measuring 12.8 inches by 12.8 inches, this personal scale provides a comfortable standing platform for users of most sizes. It provides additional stability and durability thanks to its solid metal frame. Elegant stainless steel accents and an easy-to-clean design make this scale ideal for use in a variety of settings.
column6:
I worked in health care product supply and Health o meter is the most reliable North American scale there is. I wanted something reliable. I've tried the other digital glass scales. I didn't like that  they smudge with footprints and look dirty quickly. I don't need to know my bmi from a scale I've got gadgets for that. 
Another reviewer said that the needle didn't land on zero and they just lived with it like that. What they don't know is that there is a little calibration dial on the front of the scale. Turn it back to zero whenever it's off. Unless you are a professional athlete or someone that is obsessed with knowing your weight to the ounce you won't be disappointed. It looks nice too! 
Also, I found with the glass digital scales you can't stand them up if you want them out of the way, it messes with the calibration. (This scale you just turn the dial)

column6:
My daughter had this scale at her house and I thought I would buy one. I should've asked her before I bought it because she said she would've told me not to buy the scales because they are never correct. 
You can get on them one time and it is ten pounds off, and the next time two pounds.

Oh never mind, I don't have the time to write all the problems I have had with these scales. 
The reason I gave it one star is because they didn't give me the option of minus 0.

column1: 400 Lbs Geometric Digital LCD Glass Body Weight Bath  ...

We guarantee the style is the same as shown in the pictures, but not the same performance on different bodies as on the model. Thank you!
column6: I weighed myself first in the living room, never mind what it said. I took scale into the bathroom and mysteriously gained 50 pounds. I then weighed myself in the bedroom and it read I was a flattering 135 pounds. I weigh 220 pounds in the bathroom, 160 pounds in the living room, 145 in the dining room and 135 in the bedroom. I tried everything I could think of to test it out.  It is very consistent, weight in different rooms always reads the same wrong weight. The floors are not uneven or anything. I'm going to keep this scale as a form of entertainment for guests, or maybe I misread the details and it was meant to be a party joke in the first place.

column1: American Weigh Scales 330CVS Talking Digital Bathroo  ...
column5: Talking Scale The 330CVS is our most economical talking bathroom scale. The scale features a clear English or Spanish speaking voice and low profile. The Auto-On feature turns the scale on when you stop on. No need to tap before weighing.
column6: This talking Digital LCD Scale is a bargain that operates very well.  It talks and that is great for those who don't always have their glasses on, like right out of the shower.  The sound level is fine, not too low or blaring.  The read out is large and sufficient.  It is a very thin scale and is not obstructive, so it blends in well.  The black color is nice and easier to stay clean.  The accuracy seems on par in comparison to an older scale (being replaced due to crack).  This is a more sleek and modern version scale.  The voice saying good by is interesting because of the delay and I find myself talking back.  It doesn't say hello though.  The only qualm I have it that the surface is slippery.  I have to take my slippers off or I can slip towards the wall.  I am surprised that a textured surface wasn't incorporated.  However, it is a minor detail overall.  It looks just like the photo above.

column1: Sunbeam Rotating Dial Scale (SAB700)
column5: Easily measure your weight with the Sunbeam Rotating Dial Scale. This bathroom body scale measures up to 330 pounds in 1-pound increments. The large 4.5-inch rotating dial is marked with clear gradations, allowing you to determine your weight at a glance. Measuring just 9.8 inches by 9.8 inches, this personal scale is compact enough for use in bathrooms, bedrooms, and other areas where space is limited, yet its platform provides plenty of standing room. And with its elegant white finish and minimalist design, this scale has a clean look that coordinates with a variety of decors.
column6: OK scale for a cheap price. Dial is sort of small.....for an old lady it is a bit hard to see the individeual lines (lol). But I didnt want to spend an arm and a leg so it is fine for me. You get what you pay for. If you want a great quality scale, look elsewhere. But if you want a cheap scale that does the job with no bells and whistles, this is fine.

column1: Taylor 740541032 Digital Scale
column5: Taylor Digital bath Scale with Lithium Battery and 440 pound capacity in 0.2 lb. increments; large 1.2quot; LCD readout w/ Acu-Glotmblue backlight; rubberized carry handle; nickel accented platform; requires 4 AAA batteries (included)
column6: I specifically purchased this scale for a fitness challenge I was doing. It worked great for the first three weeks; then when it came time to do my final weigh in, it won't zero out. There is always .7 lbs on the scale. Ive changed the batteries, Ive done the step on/step off thing numerous times to try to re-calibrate/tare, Ive changed the surface it is sitting on. At this point, that .7 is causing me to lose the challenge. Will be returning it.

column1: Taylor Lithium Digital Thin Profile Bath Scale Model  ...
column5: Keep track of your fitness goals with the Taylor 7340 Non-Slip Digital Bathroom Scale with Extra Large Display. The extra wide 14.0 x 12.2 platform features a non-slip, rubberized finish for added convenience. With an extra-large 3.7 x 2.0 LCD readout prominently displaying accurate measurements up to 440 lb/200 kg capacity in 0.2 lb/0.1 kg increments. This Digital Bathroom scale features Step-on Instant Read, automatically registering and displaying your weight as soon as your step on the platform. Inside the box, you will find the Taylor 7340 Non-Slip Digital Bathroom Scale with Extra Large Display, an instruction manual, and 1 branded Lithium battery. This scale is backed by a 5-Year limited warranty.
column6:
Had one exactly like this before...stopped working..it had a limited life time warranty..but the cost to ship it back wasnt worth it..my wife ordered another one online...little did i know she ordered the same model..only difference is that this one doesnt have a lifetime warranty...i think it they know they only will last few years..
Overall it's an accurate scale...but not a long lasting one...their warranty went from lifetime to a few years...

column1: Fitbit Aria 2 Wi-Fi Smart Scale
column5: Get information and motivation to reach your goals with the Fitbit Aria 2 Wi-Fi Smart Scale. This sleek scale gives you a clear, holistic picture of your health and body composition by accurately measuring weight, body fat percentage, lean mass and BMIall in one step. Reengineered with the latest technology, Aria 2 captures data with greater precision than ever. And with built-in Bluetooth, you can set it up in just a few minutes from your smartphone. Easy to set up and even easier to use, this sleek scale syncs your stats automatically to the Fitbit app, so you can see how everything you do adds upfrom steps to exercise to nutrition. Aria 2 works seamlessly with Fitbit trackers so you have more tools to help you reach your weight goals. Weight trends often share a relationship with exercise activity, resting heart rate, and even sleep habits. Compare your food consumption and exercise against your weight trends for a more well-rounded picture of your health. Logging food and exercise is quick and easy on the Fitbit app. The more you log, the better analysis youll get of your health and progress. Short-term fluctuations in weight dont always give you a realistic view of your health and fitnessits the long-term trends that matter most. Through easy-to-read graphs on the Fitbit app and online dashboard, Aria 2 helps show you the bigger picture so you can take control of your results. Aria 2 is meant to be shared. This smart scale can recognize up to 8 users while keeping individual stats private. Every time you step on the scale, Aria 2 recognizes who you are, displays your data, and sends your stats straight to your Fitbit account.
column6: Bought this about a year and a half ago. Was thrilled when I got it--so sleek and cool and it seemed to do everything. Didn't use it regularly but now am trying to keep up with my weight for medical issues and the thing will not weigh properly. It varies as much as 10 pounds or more within only moments. I looked on the Fitbit forums to see if there was a solution and there are many MANY people complaining of the same issue and there told the same solution--which DOESN'T WORK.  So now, I have a useless piece of tech junk and am now in the market for a plain old reliable scale.  I think before I buy another FitBit anything, instead of just reading the Walmart reviews (which tend to track to more recent buyers), I'll go over to the FitBit forums to see what people who have lived with the item a while are saying.

column1: Health O Meter Baby Toddler Scale (HDC100KD-01)
column5: Health O Meter Baby Toddler Scale. For kids. Convertible scale great for weighing infant and toddlers. Confidence your child is getting the right amount to eat & drink. Security lock for tray stability during use. Tray holds baby in sitting or lying position. Removable tray for use as a toddler scale. Easy to read large display. Use for many years converts to a toddler scale with weight up to 60lbs.
column6: I searched for a scale that would weigh our 11 newborn puppies. All other scales I looked at started with a minimum of 10 pounds. This one starts at 0. It also has a feature for the wiggly puppies which will hold the weight. I have been using this for two weeks now and it exceeds my expectations. The bed where you put the puppy (baby) is good size. It was very easy to put together, just put the bed onto the scale. Oh, and it also another great feature. I lay a blanket down on the scale and it will zero out the weight of the blanket! Once I am done with the scale I am giving it to my son and daughter in law for my newborn grandson! Once last thing, I ordered this online and the manufacturer had it shipped the next day and I had it within a few days! Not like other things I have ordered online and it takes 7-10 days! Highly recommend this item!

column1: Omron HBF-510W body fat scale
column5: The Full-Body Composition Monitor and Scale provides full body sensing, which is a comprehensive understanding of your body composition to help you reach your fitness goals. Full body sensing is more accurate than measuring with feet alone. It is easy to use and the HBF-510W measures five fitness indicators including body fat, visceral fat, BMI, skeletal muscle and body weight. It features a four-person profile, an easy on/off switch at base, a large LCD display and a retractable cord. This body fat and monitor scale gives you measurements in the comfort of your own home anytime you want. Measuring your weight in conjunction with other readings gives you a clearer picture of what is going on with your body making this an ideal addition to improving your health. This convenient and reliable Full-Body Composition Monitor and Scale helps you to know your numbers to help you reach your goals.
column6: i have two clinics , each one had that professional scale for more than 2 years , i never complain from any of them along all the past periode till now . really i love them more than any other equipments in my beloved clinics . really you are so good omron . thank you [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

column1: Health o Meter Professional Dial Scale (145KD-41)
column5: Professional dial scale features an oversized platform and soft-touch mat for steady footing. Scale measures up to 400 lb. in 1 lb. increments and includes an oversized dial for an easy readout. Dial scale is equipped with a chrome finished bezel.
column6: This is a $12 or $13 scale on sale for $20 ... and comes with a device (about $8) for measuring your arms, waist, thighs, etc., etc. I thought I would get a real good scale and that the $20 would guarantee it. However, it is shipped with this device for measuring how much fat you have lost on various parts of your body. I preferred a better scale and not this additional item which comes as part of the purchase. My old scale did not always set at 0 ... sometimes a pound or so under, others a pound or two less. I got tired of resetting to 0 every time I weighed myself ... so I purchased what I thought was an excellent scale. This new scale seems to need resetting to 0 everything I weigh myself. So, if you do not mind resetting each time and you can use this measuring device, I guess the $20 is a good price. But for just a decent scale, you can get one for about $7. So, I do not recommend this purchase unless you need the measuring device and are willing to reset the scale to 0 each time you weigh yourself.

column1: Health O Meter Digital Weight Tracking Scale with Te  ...
column5: Measure and monitor your weight at a glance with the Health O Meter Digital Weight Tracking Scale. With four load cells to ensure precision, this digital bathroom scale measures weight up to 400 pounds in 0.2-pound increments. The extra-large digital LCD display makes it easy to read your weight measurements. Ideal for monitoring weight loss, this personal scale can store and track the last weigh-in for up to two users. And thanks to its sleek glass platform, the scale has a contemporary design that attractively complements modern decor.
column6: I like that you can just step on it to weigh yourself. My old one you had to tap it and wait to get on. Seems to fluctuate a little though unless my weight is up and down by 2-3 lbs a day which I guess is possible. All in all, a good product that I would buy again.

column1: My Weigh Xl-700 Talking Bathroom Scale 700 Lb 320kg
column5: My Weigh Xl-700 Talking Bathroom Scale 700 Lb 320kg
column6:
I just got it today. Plenty wide enough for me to stand on, and the fact that it reads out the results for me is perfect since I can't see past my gut. It's a bit inaccurate though.

I have it on solid, steady, flat wooden flooring. No moisture, no excessive heat or cold, no radio interference, no low battery, it's brand new, fresh out the box...no reason for it to be malfunctioning.

I'm getting anywhere between 308-311 lbs. I'll probably keep it, but yeah, I'm disappointed.

column1: Salter 914whlkr Infant & Toddler Bath Scale
column5: The Salter Baby and Toddler Bath Scale is the perfect product for parents who want to keep track of their children's weight at home or between doctor visits. The scale features a comfortable, securely fitted weighing tray to keep babies safely in place when being weighed. It also comes with a Hold feature to keep accurate weight on the display, even when your child moves around. To continue using the scale when your child grows older, it easily converts to a toddler scale by simply removing the tray.The scale has an easy-to-read 1.2" LCD readout and comes with auto-zero and auto off features. It is accurate up to 44 pounds and measures in 0.5 oz increments.
column6: I bought this scale to weigh puppies once they exceeded my food scale (which happens when they become too lively at 5 weeks).  This scale works well.  I also used for an adult dog and could use the "hold" function then.  Scale is a good size and will be easy to store.

column1: Taylor Precision Products 70844191m Talking Digital   ...
column5: The Taylor Talking Digital Scale helps you to monitor your weight, while complementing your bathroom decor. This scale announces the weight reading in English, Spanish, Greek, German or Croatian.
column6: I bought this scale for my mother who has macular degeneration and also has CHF. She needed to keep track of her weight everyday but could not see the scale. The talking scale has been great! I love the looks of it and how it doesnt want to move around when my mother steps on it. I would definately recommend this!

column1: Excelvan Touch 400 lb Digital Body Fat Scale Calorie  ...
column5:
EXCELVAN Body Fat Scale High Precision LCD Display With Blue Backlight Measuring Weight Fat Muscle Bone Water KCAL BMI 6mm Tempered Glass Platform 10 Users Information Storage

Features
1. Clear LCD Display & High Precision Sensors: Blue backlight 2.9''/7.5cm x 1.4''/3.5cm LCD display shows clear data. 4 High precision strain gauge sensors symmetrically implanted on the platform, ensure that all the data measured are accurate and rapid.
2. 7 Health Metrics Measuring: To measure crucial health metrics: Weight, fat ratio, muscle rate, bone mass, water rate, KCAL, BMI, and help you to evaluate your health status.
3. Memory of 10 Users Information: Keep up to 10 user's information (Gender, age, Height) inside by P0~P9. No need to input your information again at the second time usage. Just press keys to find your information, and step on the scale to get the new measuring data.
4. Anti-slip & Stable Structure: Adopted 4 anti-slip pads, whose self-adaptive feature can adjust themselves to suitable contact angle with ground.
5. Endurable Design: Adopted 6mm tempered glass platform, which can hold 1.8kg/396lb weight at most.
6. Low Battery & Overload Indication: The scale will show 'LO' to remind you when battery power goes below 5%, and show 'O-Ld' to prompt you the measuring weight exceeds 180 KG /396lb.

Specification
Sensor: 4 High Precision Strain Gauge Sensors
Memory of Users information: 10 Users
Applicable Weight Range: 8~180KG
Weight Division: 0.1 kg/0.2 lb
Weight Unit: kg/lb/st:lb Convertible
Applicable Users' Age: 6~100 years old
LCD Display Size: 2.9''/7.5cm x 1.4''/3.5cm
Muscle % Range: 5.0~75.0%
Bone Mass: 0.5~22.6KG
Fat % Measure Range: 5.0~75.0%
Fat % Differential Resolution: 0.1%
Hydration (water) % Range: 5.0~75.0%
Hydration (water) % Differential Resolution: 0.1%
KCAL Recommend: Included
BMI: Included
Error Indication: If cant test out fat parameter ("Err")
Platform Materials/Thickness: Tempered Safety Glass/6mm
Power: 3 x 1.5V 3A Batteries(not included)
Product Size: 11.8 x 11.8 x 0.87 inches/30 x 30 x 2.2cm
Product Weight: 1.53kg/3.37lb
Package Contents:
1 x EXCELVAN Electronic Body Fat Hydration Scale
1 x User Manual

Note:
1. Please ensure the scale is placed on the flat, hard and stable surface or ground.
2. For your safety, please make sure that the glass platform and your feet are dry to prevent slipping.
3. All data are accurate to 0.1%/0.1 except for KCAL (accurate to 1).
column6: It does everything it says, plus, I'm really so happy with it! I'm using it twice daily to assist me with healthy weight management. The Bluetooth is simple and its Feelfit Apps on my iPhone and iPad Pro are uploading to Apple Health Kit. I think this is an amazing tool and I'm very excited to have the various indexes, measurements and trends plotted for me - which can be shared electronically with a trainer or physician! Totally worth it.

column1: Taylor 9876 SuperBrite Digital Bathroom Scale with L  ...
column5: For the ultimate in performance and precision, turn to the Taylor 9876 SuperBrite Digital Bathroom Scale with LED Display. A durable 11.5 x 11.9 black platform constructed of high-impact styrene incorporates a non-slip surface for a comfortable experience. This digital bathroom scale features a vibrant easy-to-read 3.7 x 1.3 SuperBrite LED display, clearly displaying accurate measurements up to 350 lb/160 kg in 0.5 lb/0.2 kg increments from any viewing angle. Featuring Step-on Instant Read, this scale will automatically register and display your weight as soon as your step on the platform. Inside the box, you will find the Taylor 9876 SuperBrite Digital Bathroom Scale with LED Display, an instruction manual, and 3 branded AAA batteries. This scale is backed by a 5-Year limited warranty.
column6: Only thing you can't read the weight as easy as our old scales.
